pkgmetadata.longdescription: Binary Expansion Testing // Nonparametric detection of nonuniformity and dependence with Binary Expansion Testing (BET). See Kai Zhang (2019) BET on Independence, Journal of the American Statistical Association, 114:528, 1620-1637, DOI:10.1080/01621459.2018.1537921, Kai Zhang, Wan Zhang, Zhigen Zhao, Wen Zhou. (2023). BEAUTY Powered BEAST, doi:10.48550/arXiv.2103.00674 and Wan Zhang, Zhigen Zhao, Michael Baiocchi, Yao Li, Kai Zhang. (2023) SorBET: A Fast and Powerful Algorithm to Test Dependence of Variables, Techinical report.
